title: Herbal Medicine -Fact or Fiction
brief_description: Examines the use of herbs as medicine in third world countries, particularly in Mexico, and suggests that herbal medicine has an important role to play in conjunction with Western medicine.
description: Examines the use of herbs as medicine in third world countries, particularly in Mexico, and suggests that herbal medicine has an important role to play in conjunction with Western medicine.
